name: ScamDetective
0:
”Alexa, open scam detective”
”Alexa, scam help”
”Alexa, is this a scam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scam detective
des: Scam Detective helps seniors figure out if a phone call or message is a scam. Alexa asks a series of questions to identify the scam and tells you want to do if you've sent money or personal information to a scammer. Scam Detective also offers common tips to prevent against future scams.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
